Docs.param: The delegate for configuring the that will be used to construct the for the host.
Docs.summary: Sets up the configuration for the remainder of the build process and application. This can be called multiple times and the results will be additive. The results will be available at for subsequent operations, as well as in .
Docs.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

static member ConfigureDefaults : Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder * string[] -> Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder

Docs.summary: Configures an existing instance with pre-configured defaults. This will overwrite previously configured values and is intended to be called before additional configuration calls.
Docs.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The following defaults are applied to the <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder>: * set the <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostEnvironment.ContentRootPath> to the result of <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory> * load host <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from "DOTNET_" prefixed environment variables * load host <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from supplied command line args * load app <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[<xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostEnvironment.EnvironmentName>].json' * load app <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from User Secrets when <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostEnvironment.EnvironmentName> is 'Development' using the entry assembly * load app <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from environment variables * load app <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration> from supplied command line args * configure the <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory> to log to the console, debug, and event source output * enables scope validation on the dependency injection container when <xref:Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostEnvironment.EnvironmentName> is 'Development'

Docs.param: A that can be used to cancel the console.
Docs.summary: Enables console support, builds and starts the host, and waits for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM to shut down.
Docs.returns: A that only completes when the token is signaled or application is shutdown.

Docs.summary: Listens for Ctrl+C or SIGTERM and calls to start the shutdown process. This will unblock extensions like RunAsync and WaitForShutdownAsync.
Docs.returns: The same instance of the for chaining.
